attributes.action: Legalize cannabis for medical and recreational use
attributes.additional_details:
The UK have been falling behind the times in many aspects and cannabis legalization is one of them. Legalizing cannabis as well all no would create numerous jobs in the industry and cut out a major part of the income to many back street dealer's, as well as creating many jobs it would also bring in a much needed boost to the economy and the tax's raised could be used for so many good causes such as the NHS, schools library's and many more.
The medical benefits alone should be enough to change it
attributes.background: Legalize cannabis and all cbd products in the UK for medical and recreational use, It's widely known that cannabis has many medical Benefits and can produce a huge amount in taxable revenue.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300475
